shortdesc.ph: Enables loopback recording, mixing the sound card output into the audio stream sent.

p.codeblock: virtual int enableLoopbackRecordingEx(const RtcConnection& connection, bool enabled, const char* deviceName = NULL) = 0;

section.p: After enabling this feature, the sound card output is mixed into the audio stream sent to remote users.

ul.li: This method is only applicable to macOS and Windows.

macOS does not support loopback recording from the default sound card. To use this feature, use a virtual sound card and pass its name to the deviceName parameter. AgoraALD is recommended as the virtual sound card.
This method supports only one sound card for audio capture.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method applies to multi-channel scenarios.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable loopback recording:
: Enable loopback recording.
: (Default) Disable loopback recording.

ul.li: macOS: Name of the virtual sound card. Default is , which uses AgoraALD for loopback recording.
Windows: Name of the sound card. Default is , which uses the current device's sound card for recording.
